com.crawljax.core
Class Crawler

java.lang.Object
  com.crawljax.core.Crawler
All Implemented Interfaces:
Runnable
Direct Known Subclasses:
InitialCrawler
public class Crawler
extends Object
implements Runnable

Class that performs crawl actions. It is designed to be run inside a Thread.

Version:
$Id$
Author:
dannyroest@gmail.com (Danny Roest), Stefan Lenselink
See Also:
run()

Field Detail

LOGGER

private static final org.apache.log4j.Logger LOGGER

ONE_SECOND

private static final int ONE_SECOND
See Also:
Constant Field Values

browser

private EmbeddedBrowser browser
The main browser window 1 to 1 relation; Every Thread will get on browser assigned in the run function.

controller

private final CrawljaxController controller
The central DataController. This is a multiple to 1 relation Every Thread shares an instance of the same controller! All operations / fields used in the controller should be checked for thread safety.

depth

private int depth
Depth register.

backTrackPath

private final CrawlPath backTrackPath
The path followed from the index to the current state.

candidateExtractor

private CandidateElementExtractor candidateExtractor
The utility which is used to extract the candidate clickables.

fired

private boolean fired

name

private String name
The name of this Crawler when not default (automatic) this will be added to the Thread name in the thread as (name). In the CrawlerExecutor.beforeExecute(Thread, Runnable) the name is retrieved using the toString() function.

See Also:
toString(), CrawlerExecutor.beforeExecute(Thread, Runnable)

stateMachine

private final StateMachine stateMachine
The sateMachine for this Crawler, keeping track of the path crawled by this Crawler.

configurationReader

private final CrawljaxConfigurationReader configurationReader

formHandler

private FormHandler formHandler

crawlQueueManager

private final CrawlQueueManager crawlQueueManager
The object to places calls to add new Crawlers or to remove one.

Constructor Detail

Crawler

public Crawler(CrawljaxController mother,
               List<Eventable> exactEventPath,
               String name)
Parameters:
mother - the main CrawljaxController
exactEventPath - the event path up till this moment.
name - a name for this crawler (default is empty).

Crawler

@Deprecated
protected Crawler(CrawljaxController mother,
                             List<Eventable> returnPath)
Deprecated. better to use Crawler(CrawljaxController, CrawlPath)

Private Crawler constructor for a 'reload' crawler. Only used internally.

Parameters:
mother - the main CrawljaxController
returnPath - the path used to return to the last state, this can be a empty list

Crawler

protected Crawler(CrawljaxController mother,
                  CrawlPath returnPath)
Private Crawler constructor for a 'reload' crawler. Only used internally.

Parameters:
mother - the main CrawljaxController
returnPath - the path used to return to the last state, this can be a empty list
Method Detail

goToInitialURL

public void goToInitialURL()
Brings the browser to the initial state.

fireEvent

private boolean fireEvent(Eventable eventable)
Try to fire a given event on the Browser.

Parameters:
eventable - the eventable to fire
Returns:
true iff the event is fired

handleInputElements

private void handleInputElements(Eventable eventable)
Enters the form data. First, the related input elements (if any) to the eventable are filled in and then it tries to fill in the remaining input elements.

Parameters:
eventable - the eventable element.

goBackExact

private void goBackExact()
                  throws CrawljaxException
Reload the browser following the backTrackPath to the given currentEvent.

Throws:
CrawljaxException - if the Eventable.getTargetStateVertix() encounters an error.

clickTag

private Crawler.ClickResult clickTag(Eventable eventable)
                              throws CrawljaxException
Parameters:
eventable - the element to execute an action on.
Returns:
the result of the click operation
Throws:
CrawljaxException - an exception.

getExacteventpath

@Deprecated
public final List<Eventable> getExacteventpath()
Deprecated. use CrawlSession.getCurrentCrawlPath()

Return the Exacteventpath.

Returns:
the exacteventpath

depthLimitReached

private boolean depthLimitReached(int depth)
Have we reached the depth limit?

Parameters:
depth - the current depth. Added as argument so this call can be moved out if desired.
Returns:
true if the limit has been reached

spawnThreads

private void spawnThreads(StateVertix state)

crawlAction

private Crawler.ClickResult crawlAction(CandidateCrawlAction action)
                                 throws CrawljaxException
Throws:
CrawljaxException

crawl

private boolean crawl()
               throws CrawljaxException
Crawl through the clickables.

Throws:
CrawljaxException - if an exception is thrown.

newStateDetected

private boolean newStateDetected(StateVertix orrigionalState)
                          throws CrawljaxException
A new state has been found!

Parameters:
orrigionalState - the current state
Returns:
true if crawling must continue false otherwise.
Throws:
CrawljaxException

init

public void init()
          throws InterruptedException
Initialize the Crawler, retrieve a Browser and go to the initial URL when no browser was present. rewind the state machine and goBack to the state if there is exactEventPath is specified.

Throws:
InterruptedException - when the request for a browser is interrupted.

shutdown

public void shutdown()
Terminate and clean up this Crawler, release the acquired browser. Notice that other Crawlers might still be active. So this function does NOT shutdown all Crawlers active that should be done with ThreadPoolExecutor.shutdown()

run

public void run()
The main function stated by the ExecutorService. Crawlers add themselves to the list by calling CrawlQueueManager.addWorkToQueue(Crawler). When the ExecutorService finds a free thread this method is called and when this method ends the Thread is released again and a new Thread is started

Specified by:
run in interface Runnable
See Also:
Executors.newFixedThreadPool(int), ExecutorService

getBrowser

public EmbeddedBrowser getBrowser()
Return the browser used in this Crawler Thread.

Returns:
the browser used in this Crawler Thread

toString

public String toString()
Overrides:
toString in class Object

getStateMachine

public StateMachine getStateMachine()
Returns:
the state machine.

isDomChanged

private boolean isDomChanged(StateVertix stateBefore,
                             StateVertix stateAfter)
Test to see if the (new) DOM is changed with regards to the old DOM. This method is Thread safe.

Parameters:
stateBefore - the state before the event.
stateAfter - the state after the event.
Returns:
true if the state is changed according to the compare method of the oracle.

checkConstraints

private boolean checkConstraints()
Checks the state and time constraints. This function is nearly Thread-safe.

Returns:
true if all conditions are met.
